H0.text: what college did magic johnson play for. University of California, Los Angeles (UCLA)

H1.text: what college did magic johnson play for. University of Kentucky

H2.text: what college did magic johnson play for. University of North Carolina

H3.text: what college did magic johnson play for. Michigan State University

A4.text: He ultimately decided to attend Michigan State when coach Jud Heathcote told him he could play the point guard position.

A5.text: After winning a national championship with the Michigan State Spartans in 1979, Johnson was selected first overall in the 1979 NBA draft by the Lakers.
